summary: A request I recieved. A Nord female vampire named Sam. Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
Meet Sam. Sam is a Female Nord Vampire, capable of fighting. She is found in Winterhold.

Sam was a request I had received, and hopefully has been fulfilled to the specifications of the requester.

As for anyone who wants images, go to the images tab and click "From Users". Pictures courtesy of TrinityKill.

Want to request a follower for yourself? Go ahead, I'm open to ideas!
https://epicmantdog.wufoo.com/forms/skyrim-follower-mod-request/

Enjoy :)
author: EpicmanTdog
